var animation=[];function InsertionSort(arr){animation=[];var key,j;for(var i=1;i<arr.length;i++){j=i-1;key=arr[i];//key is in unsorted array
while(j>=0&&key<arr[j]){var _ref=[arr[j],arr[j+1]];arr[j+1]=_ref[0];arr[j]=_ref[1];animation.push([j,j+1]);j--;}}return animation;}export default InsertionSort;
